name: 英語演講：演說技巧
restrict: ◎必須先修過【ENU0269  英語會話（一）】、【ENU0270  英語會話（二）】
description: This course aims to introduce you to the basics of interpersonal communication and public speaking. In particular, emphasis will be placed on audience analysis, outlining, designing and delivering a range of speeches. In addition, skills in overcoming nervousness, and developing confidence and a dynamic verbal profile in oral presentations will be covered.
goals: Learn effective techniques to control nervousness
Learn the art of mind-mapping, brainstorming, and outlining
syllabus: This course aims to introduce you to the basics of interpersonal communication and public speaking.
